contentrichtext.text: '''Whitton''' can refer to: {{TOCright}} ==People== * [[Charlotte Whitton]] (1896–1975), Canadian feminist and Mayor of Ottawa * [[David Whitton]], Scottish politician * [[Donald Whitton]] (born 1923), Canadian cellist, and teacher * [[Evan Whitton]], Australian journalist * [[Geoff Whitton]] (born 1942), Australian rules footballer * [[Ivo Whitton]] (1893–1967), Australian golfer * [[John Whitton]] (1820–1898), Australian rail engineer * [[Margaret Whitton]] (born 1950), American actress * [[Michael Whitton]], American film director * [[Steve Whitton]] (born 1960), English footballer ==Places== ===United Kingdom=== ;England * [[Whitton, County Durham]] * [[Whitton, North Lincolnshire]] * [[Whitton, London]] * [[Whitton, Shropshire]] * [[Whitton, Suffolk]] ===Australia=== * [[Whitton, New South Wales]] ==United States== * Whitton, California, name prior to 1911 of [[Planada, California]] {{disambig|geo|surname}}
